ItSText: Time redefined, health companion, style innovation.
homeAboutUsP1: is a company with extensive experience in the construction sector. We take great pride in our mining concession where we extract and produce three high-quality products: limestone, bazal, and dolomite. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our annual analysis of the materials we extract, ensuring that we consistently produce top-notch products.
homeAboutUsP2: Our limestone is a versatile material that is widely used in the construction industry because of its durability and strength. It is used in the production of cement, concrete, and asphalt, as well as in the manufacturing of glass and steel.
ft4: Boulevard Phillip the Second of Macedon no.3, Soravia Centre, 11th floor 1000, Skopje, North Macedonia

minDesc: Mining represents a deep connection between humanity and the natural world. It reminds us that we are not separate from the earth - we are part of it. We must take care to preserve and protect the fragile ecosystems that sustain us. Mining therefore, is not only as a source of wealth and resources but also as a catalyst for a more sustainable and harmonious relationship between humanity and the planet.
cnstDesc: There is more to construction than mere necessity and utility. The process of laying down miles of pavement and asphalt is an aesthetic endeavor. From the graceful curves of a mountain pass to the symmetrical patterns of an urban street grid, roads can be strikingly beautiful in their own right, blending seamlessly with the natural environment or creating a bold contrast against it.
rnwDesc: Renewable energy is a symbol of hope and possibility. As we look to a future that is increasingly defined by the threat of climate change, renewable energy represents a pathway towards a more sustainable and equitable world, one where there is complete harmony between humanity and the natural world. In the end, renewable energy is a source of profound inspiration, a shining example of what humanity can achieve when hearts and minds are united.
ItSDesc: Applied Science is about finding elegant and efficient ways to use technology to enhance human experience. Whether it is developing cutting-edge software, designing sleek and intuitive interfaces, or creating advanced artificial intelligence systems, applied sciences solutions are constantly pushing the boundaries of what is possible. Opening up new avenues of productivity, creativity, and innovation is the essence of this department.
minDescLg: Bukojchani Mine is a leading mining company located in North Macedonia. It has been operational since 2005. The mine is situated 62 km southwest of Skopje and is rich in limestone, basalt, and dolomite with proven reserves of 42,000,000 metric tons. It has a concession agreement with the Ministry of Economy until 2026 and is renewable on the request of the investor for a further 20 years under the same conditions. The company has a current annual capacity of 500,000 metric tons annually and has been supplying raw materials for various industrial projects in the region, including railways, expressways, and other infrastructure development. Thor Industries has an experienced management team that has undertaken notable construction projects such as the Izvor-Boshkov Most project, which involved the drilling and blasting of 18.48 km of mountainous roads connecting the cities of Debar and Kichevo. The management team was responsible for the planning, supervision, health, and safety of the project, as well as carrying out specialized construction activities. The company has also been involved in the construction and management of Planet Complex, a luxurious exclusive neighborhood that overlooks the Matka canyon, located just 3 km away from the City of Skopje. Our team carried out civil and infrastructure works and managed the construction of 57 villas, a school, private hospital, hotel, and other amenities. Thor Industries is also committed to sustainable development and has undertaken renewable energy projects, including the development, planning, and construction of a 3.5 MW/p PV project near the mine. Other Projects include the development, planning, and construction of Baciska „2“ and „3“ hydroelectric power plants. Overall, Thor Industries is a reliable and experienced company that has been supplying raw materials for various industrial projects in the region. The company is committed to sustainable development and has a proven track record of successfully managing construction and renewable energy projects.
cnstDescLg: Construction is the process of creating infrastructure, buildings, and other structures that are essential to the functioning of modern society. From roads and bridges to buildings and tunnels, construction plays a critical role in facilitating economic growth and development. One of the main benefits of construction, outside the utility provided by what is built, is the creation of new jobs and overall economic growth. The construction industry employs millions of people around the world, from architects and engineers to carpenters and electricians. By investing in construction projects, governments and private investors can create new job opportunities, boost local economies, and drive economic growth. Moreover, construction is essential for building and maintaining the infrastructure that we rely on every day. Roads and bridges, for example, allow us to travel and transport goods quickly and efficiently while buildings provide us with shelter, workspaces, and community spaces. Tunnels and other underground structures enable us to access resources such as water, energy, and minerals that are essential to our modern way of life. In addition to these benefits, construction creates spaces that foster community, creativity, and innovation. Buildings, parks, and public spaces provide us with places to gather, socialize, and exchange ideas, while cultural and artistic landmarks inspire us and remind us of our shared humanity. It is important to note however, that construction also has significant environmental impacts. The construction industry is responsible for a significant portion of global greenhouse gas emissions and construction projects can have significant impacts on local ecosystems and natural resources. As such, it is critical that we strive to minimize the environmental impacts of construction and adopt more sustainable practices, such as using renewable energy sources and reducing waste.
rnwDescLg: Renewable energy is a type of energy that comes from natural resources that are replenished over time, such as solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal power. Unlike fossil fuels, which are finite and contribute to environmental pollution, renewable energy is clean, sustainable, and helps mitigate the harmful impacts of climate change. Furthermore, renewable energy reduces greenhouse gas emissions. By relying on clean and sustainable sources of power, we can significantly reduce our dependence on fossil fuels, which are the primary drivers of climate change.This, in turn, can help us avoid the impacts of global warming, including rising sea levels, increasingly frequent and severe natural disasters, and the reduction of biodiversity. Renewable energy can improve energy security and resilience. Unlike fossil fuels, which are subject to price volatility and geopolitical tensions, renewable energy is often more locally sourced and less susceptible to supply chain disruptions. This can help countries and communities become more self-sufficient and weather energy crises. Moreover, renewable energy has the potential to spur economic growth and job creation. As the renewable energy industry continues to grow and mature, it is creating new opportunities for entrepreneurs, workers, and investors. In fact, renewable energy is already one of the fastest-growing sectors of the global economy, with the potential to create millions of new jobs in the coming decades. Finally, renewable energy can help promote social justice and environmental equity. Because many renewable energy sources are decentralized and distributed, they can help bring power and opportunity to communities that have historically been marginalized or underserved. This can help create a more inclusive and equitable society, where everyone has access to energy. As we continue to transition to a more sustainable energy future, it is important that we work together to accelerate the adoption of renewable energy technologies and make them more accessible and affordable for all.
ourStaff: Our Team: The Heart of Apple
aboutPageFirst: we are more than just a technology company; we are innovators, dreamers, and creators. Since our founding in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne, we have been on a mission to design and deliver products that enrich and enhance the lives of people around the world.
aboutPageSecond: Our vision is to create groundbreaking products that redefine the possibilities of technology. We believe in the power of innovation to make a positive impact on the world, and we constantly strive to push the boundaries of what is possible. From the iconic Macintosh computer to the revolutionary iPhone, our products have consistently set new standards in design, performance, and user experience.
aboutPageThird: At the heart of Apple's identity is a commitment to design excellence. Our products are not just tools; they are beautifully crafted expressions of art and functionality. We believe that design is not just about how a product looks, but also about how it works. Every detail, from the sleek curves of our devices to the intuitive user interfaces, is carefully considered to provide a seamless and delightful experience.
aboutPageFourth: Innovation is in our DNA. We have a long history of introducing groundbreaking technologies that have transformed industries and changed the way people live. Whether it's the introduction of the App Store, the development of the Macintosh graphical user interface, or the integration of cutting-edge features like Face ID, Apple is synonymous with pushing the envelope of what technology can achieve.
aboutPageFifth: We recognize the responsibility that comes with being a global leader, and we are committed to making a positive impact on the environment. From using recycled materials in our products to transitioning to renewable energy sources for our facilities, sustainability is woven into the fabric of our business. We are working towards a future where every product we make reflects our commitment to the planet.
aboutPageSixth: Apple is not just a company; it's a community of creators, developers, and users who are passionate about making a difference. Our products empower people to unleash their creativity, whether it's through filmmaking, music production, app development, or any other form of expression. We believe that technology should be a tool for empowerment, and we are dedicated to providing the tools that enable individuals to make a lasting impact.
minSlogan: Mining the future, powering the world.
cnstSlogan: Building roads that pave the way for progress.
rnwSlogan: Harnessing the power of nature for a sustainable future.
ItSSlogan: Innovative solutions for the challenges of today and tomorrow.
CTAdescription: Achieve success with innovative solutions tailored to your unique project needs.
OurStaff: Our Team: The Heart of Apple
OurStaff_text1: Behind every revolutionary product and groundbreaking innovation at Apple is a team of passionate and talented individuals who embody the spirit of creativity, collaboration, and excellence. Our staff is the heartbeat of Apple, and their unwavering commitment to pushing boundaries and creating extraordinary experiences sets us apart.
OurStaff_text2: Apple's success is built on the diversity of our team. We bring together individuals from various backgrounds, cultures, and fields of expertise, fostering a dynamic and inclusive environment. Our engineers, designers, marketers, and specialists collectively contribute their unique perspectives, skills, and experiences, creating a synergy that drives our continuous innovation.
OurStaff_text3: What unites our team is a shared passion for excellence. From the engineers who meticulously fine-tune the inner workings of our devices to the designers who obsess over every detail of the user experience, Apple employees take pride in delivering products that not only meet but exceed the highest standards. This dedication to excellence is the driving force behind our industry-leading technologies.

ConsSlogan: Wireless freedom, crystal sound, effortless immersion.
ConsDesc: Consultants are highly skilled professionals who provide specialized advice and guidance to businesses, organizations, and individuals in need of their expertise. These experts typically have extensive knowledge and experience in a specific industry or field, allowing them to provide valuable insights and solutions to complex problems. Consulting experts may work independently or as part of a consulting firm, and they may provide a range of services, such as strategic planning, project management, financial analysis, marketing, and more. Whether you're looking to improve your organization's performance, expand your business, or solve a specific problem, our consultants can offer tailored solutions to help you achieve your goals.
